body.name: Fitheaven Seat Cushion for Tailbone Pain Relief - Office Chair Cushion
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 12 mins
features: EFFECTIVE PAIN RELIEF: Reduce lower back, tailbone and sciatica pain with our office chair cushions. The tailbone pain relief design evenly distributes weight to reduce pressure and pain.ief Cushion evenly distributes weight to reduce pressure and pain.
DESIGNED TO IMPROVE POSTURE: Our office chair lower back support cushion has a unique U-shaped tailbone cutout that promotes proper spinal alignment and improves posture.
PERFECT SUPPORT: Enjoy lasting comfort during long work days with our Tailbone Pain Relief Cushion. It's made of comfort foam that utilizes body heat to conform to your hips without flattening out!
MULTI-PURPOSE SEAT CUSHION: Can be used as a tailbone pain relief cushion, car driving cushion, donut cushion, office chair cushion and tailbone cushion.
COMFORTABLE CAR SEAT CUSHION: Our car seat cushion is designed for your comfort and provides a comfortable seating experience for long periods of sitting in the car
COOL & DRY: Our chair cushions keep you cool, dry and comfortable. Breathable moisture-wicking outer layer helps prevent sweating from sitting for long periods of time
body.description: Office Chair Seat Cushion, Enhances Posture and Support, Non-Slip Bottom, Ideal Tailbone Cushion for Stress Relief - Premium Quality Gaming, Automotive, Office Chair Seat Cushion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Feels great and gives excellent support

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this on my office chair for long work sessions and I can't say anything bad about it. Makes my worn out chair much more comfortable and seems to help my lower back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great supportive pillow!
reviews.reviewText: I often get together with other papercrafter’s for long periods of time with what we call a crop. This involves a great deal of sitting chatting with your friends while also doing some paper crafting. Often these events are held in local churches, libraries, etc. and good chairs are not to be seen anywhere. I’d like to have this cushion and I can take each time I go to one of these events so I can be comfortable without causing pain to my hip and knee. I like that this seems to stand up very well, plus size frame without flattening it. The cover is able to be washed easily with a nice zipper in the back of the cushion. I did spill some soda on one day when I was able to blocked off the soda as the material seem to repel water. I think everyone should have one of these is a truly makes a difference in your day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Nope, no relief
reviews.reviewText: I have bad sciatica, and I was hoping this would provide some relief. It did not. I couldn't stay seated on the cushion because it would keep sliding me out into the floor. I gave it to my mom and she is going to try it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy but not soft or enough cusion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed for my classroom chair
reviews.reviewText: My classroom chair is absolutely horrible... no padding and very uncomfortable. I didn't want to spend any money on a fancy desk chair so I was looking for something to use with it. This cushion is just what I needed! It turned my horrible chair into something that feels very good now! I can also use it for when we have professional development in the cafeteria and when sitting on those benches! Also plan on using it for sporting events in the bleachers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought 3 different seat cushions from 3 different brands to see which I like better.This is WAY TO HARD to sit in. Not comfortable at all, compared to the other 2 I purchased.I don't see how in the picture, they show a hand print. My hand can't even make an indention like that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really wasn't sure about where to start searching (brand wise) for a seat cushion. I work an office job and I sit in my chair for long periods of time throughout the day. I have been experiencing lower back pain after sitting for a while, so I knew something had to change. I thought I would try this before I invested in something significantly more expensive. This is actually an incredible cushion, its firm but squishy at the same time. I have a lot of back relief from this and I would say at least 80% of my back pain is gone now all due to the posture support this provides.
